summary: The taxpayer, an Indian owned corporation operating as a general contractor, seeks reconsideration of Det. No. 10-0307. We affirm the holding in Det. No. 10-0307, that the taxpayer’s purchase of capital assets and routing delivery of those assets through Indian country to the taxpayer’s plant outside Indian country does not qualify for exemption under WAC 458-20-192 (Rule 192), and deny the petition.
